name: MFF:ACCELERATING INFRASTRUCTURE INVSTMNT FCLTY IN INDIA-TRANCHE1
info: The Tranche 1 of the MFF involves a financial intermediary loan of $400 million from the ordinary capital resources of the Asian Development Bank to India Infrastructure Finance Company Limited, to be guaranteed by India, to support renewed government efforts to accelerate infrastructure growth through increased private sector investment given competing pressures on fiscal resources. The loan supports for financing of public-private partnership (PPP) infrastructure projects through (i) direct lending; (ii) take-out financing; and (iii) subordinate debt, all in line with IIFCL's operational mandates.
